review: Great Doctor. Explains everything in detail. Fully satisfied with his diagnosos and treatment. On time appointment.

context: Lifestyle Disorders Treatment,Joint and Muscle Problems,
review: I visited doctor Manjunath at Apollo Ecity clinic. He patiently listened to my problem and was diagnosed my issue as lifestyle disorder and didn't prescribe many medicines, infact just 2 medicines and asked me to focus more on workout n yoga. He did a thorough examination of my shoulder muscles and explained the issue in layman terms and was quite jovial in his explanation. Overall a very positive approach he has n he is definitely not into prescribing medicines unless needed.

****** ** **** **** *** ************** I had lots of tension for my son whose hand got fracture, but after conversation I felt relief. Doctor is not behind writing too many medicine or tests. In short I would say he is very good and I would recommend him..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely friendly Dr. Explained the whole issue in detail and kept assuring that nothing to worry . Provided with fairly simple and clear treatment for the issue without any complications. Very good listener and provided some valuable advise. I would definitely recommend Dr. Manjunath

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ****** ** *** ** *** ****** ****** * *** **** He not only came during festival but also made sure x rays are taken at right time considering festive season suggested different place. He also ccame along to another hospital to review the x ray and finally suggest what need to be done. For orthopedic issues I would suggest meet this Doc. .

I went for the pain in my little and fourth finger which I though due to tennis elbow. He patiently explained the cause as well as remedies. He also refrained from prescribing any unnecessary tests as well as medicines. 
I appreciate his approach to the well being of the his patient.
Doctor is very friendly . His suggestion is working for me. Need to wait for some more time to come to conclusions.
Doctor has answered all my questions and explained about the issue clearly. Adviced me to use medicine before going for any operation
Great diagnosis and the remedy is working , my pain is less i can now seat up and work properly in a chair
Doctor listened to me patiently and prescribed medication... would like to recommend the Doc to all ortho patients.

Doctor was very friendly and explained the issue clearly. 
Cleared a few other questions that I had.

Would definitely recommend.
The doctor examined the patient in the efficient way and explained the technical aspects. Made the patient feel comfortable and suggested only what is needed
Doctor has patience to listen to patient problems and he will explain the issue in detail. ** **** *** ********* *********** *****.Overall very nice experience with Dr. Manjunath Gopal sir.

review: He was patient, friendly *** *** *** **** ** ** **** *********** ***** ** ***** Instead he was willing to listen and explained exactly what has happened to the spine and why. Highly recommended.
We experienced and manage the patient really well. Invested good time with us explaining all the details.
First of all I would like to say the way he responded is very good and also explained issue very clearly and didn't gave kuch medication as well
He patiently assessed the condition and explained in detail. Was relaxed after he explained. It was a bicep tendon strain and not a fracture. Thank God.
Very thorough in analysis as well as while explaining it. Visited for my mother's shoulder fracture.
